item.title: Why fast-food companies like KFC and Chick-fil-A are betting on chicken tenders again
item.description: Fast-food companies like KFC, Taco Bell and McDonald's are getting back into chicken tenders to boost sales and capitalize on the next chicken trend.

item.title: Former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi gets hip replacement following injury in Luxembourg
item.description: Former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi was hospitalized after sustaining an injury while traveling with a congressional delegation in Luxembourg.

item.title: A decade ago, she took over a struggling chipmaker—now she's worth $1 billion: 'Everything takes time'
item.description: Over the course of a decade, AMD CEO Lisa Su engineered a huge turnaround at the once-languishing chipmaker — and saw her net worth rise in the proces...

item.title: Broadcom's long and winding path to the trillion-dollar club, and how Trump played a role
item.description: Broadcom became the eighth U.S. tech company to eclipse $1 trillion in market cap on Friday after the stock's record gain.

item.title: Why it's gotten more difficult to get a free first-class upgrade
item.description: Airlines are racing to add comforts such as lie-flat seats, entertainment systems with bigger screens and even suites with closing doors.
